pylayers.signal.bsignal.TBsignal.translate¶

TBsignal.translate(tau)[source]¶

translate signal by tau

Parameters :

tau : float

delay for translation

Warning

Once translated original signal and translated might be not on the same grid

Examples

>>> from pylayers.signal.bsignal import *
>>> from matplotlib.pylab import *
>>> ip = EnImpulse()
>>> ip.translate(-10)
>>> ip.plot()
>>> show()

(Source code, png, hires.png, pdf)
